testcase.name: Verify visual elements of the Dashboard, including labels, text accuracy, color schemes, sizes, and alignment
testcase.system-out: When the user enters a valid username in the "Username" field...............passed And the user enters a valid password in the "Password" field................passed And the user clicks the "LOGIN" button......................................passed Then all visual elements should be accurately displayed according to the design specifications.passed

testcase.name: Verify that the time intervals on the chart are correctly represented
testcase.system-out: When the user enters a valid username in the "Username" field...............passed And the user enters a valid password in the "Password" field................passed And the user clicks the "LOGIN" button......................................passed When the user selects a different channel from the "simulator-mtn" dropdown.passed Then Verify that the time intervals on the axis correctly labeled...........passed And the Pie chart should display statuses: sent, delivered, failed, errors, queued, started, and completed.passed

testcase.name: Verify that the user can hover over the pie chart segments and view correct message information

failure.message: Failed to hover over element: By.xpath: //*[name()='path' and contains(@name,'Queued')]

testcase.name: Verify that Data changes according to each Channels selected
testcase.system-out: When the user enters a valid username in the "Username" field...............passed And the user enters a valid password in the "Password" field................passed And the user clicks the "LOGIN" button......................................passed When the user selects a different channel from the "MTN Uganda Limited" dropdown.passed And user gets the data from the page to compare with........................passed Then the user selects a different channel from the "simulator-mtn" dropdown.passed Then Validate that the data from the previous channel does not match with the current channel.passed
